item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor TCAS II Functionality (STC ST02053LA) – Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) (VSI/RA) – One Inoperative (EFB Installed)

remarks.para: May be inoperative on non-flying pilot side.

placard.para: Placard affected IVSI "RA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
